duties_responsibilities.duty: Operate and maintain a compressor station, including starting and stopping engines and ensuring the safe and proper operation of compressor units and associated equipment.
Monitor and record operating data including pressures, temperatures, speeds, flow rates, lubricant and coolant levels, and make adjustments according to loading diagrams and operating schedules.
Perform routine maintenance on engines and compressors, including service, tune-ups, oil changes, and valve adjustments.
Make emergency repairs and recognize and correct abnormal operating conditions to minimize the risk of failure.
Operate valves to control the flow of gas, and make major repairs and overhauls on equipment as needed.
Work with heavy tools and equipment, monitor and maintain facility systems, and prepare necessary paperwork for assigned job duties.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or equivalent and 3+ years of direct compressor station experience or 3+ years of demonstrated professional mechanical experience.
